scripts.build: npx babel ./src -d ./dist/src && npx babel index.js -d ./dist && cp package.json ./dist && cp bottender.config.js ./dist && cp .env ./dist
scripts.release: npm run build && npm run docker && docker push asia.gcr.io/develop-server/rytass-meetings && rm -rf ./dist
scripts.local:dev: npm run build && cd ./dist && npm run dev
scripts.local:start: npm run build && cd ./dist && npm run start
scripts.local:console: npm run build && cd ./dist && npm run console
